Steps.Message: Update at 04:53 - Our engineers have been in touch, and to allow time for repairs to be completed, we're estimating to have your power back on between 05:30 and 06:30. We'll keep you updated with any further news from site.

We became aware of a power cut at 01:50. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 04:53 - Our engineers have been in touch, and to allow time for repairs to be completed, we're estimating to have your power back on between 05:30 and 06:30. We'll keep you updated with any further news from site.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: Due to a faulty piece of network equipment we had to turn off your power.
